summary: Completed comprehensive testing of ShopFactory manufacturing and fulfillment app. Backend APIs are fully functional, but frontend cookie-based authentication has integration issues preventing full UI testing.

flaky_endpoints.symptoms: Intermittent 401 responses when using cookie authentication from browser

integration_issues.issue: Session cookies not persisting properly in browser, causing redirects to login page

passed_tests: Backend API root endpoint responds correctly
Authentication endpoints exist and validate properly
Protected endpoints require authentication (401 without token)
Demo data seeding works via API (admin role required)
Dashboard stats API returns correct structure
Orders, stores, stages, time-logs endpoints accessible
User stats and stage stats endpoints functional
Login page loads with Google OAuth button
Dashboard UI loads initially with proper KPI cards
Load Demo Data button visible for admin users
Charts and quick actions sections render correctly
action_item_for_main_agent: Fix frontend cookie-based authentication integration. The session cookies are not persisting properly in the browser, causing authenticated users to be redirected to login page. Backend Bearer token auth works perfectly, but frontend cookie handling needs debugging. Check cookie domain, path, security settings and frontend session validation logic.
